Been awhile since I sent a sword to Japan for advice at the NBTHK as to whether 
a sword will shinsa well, before polishing. I used to go thru Oscar, Mr. 
Sugiyama.  Anyway, who handles this these days. BobElder  www.orlandotaikai.com
